entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: Kreacher is an elf who is being tortured by Voldemort. He cries for his Master Regulus and Mistress Black to save him.

entities.name: regulus
entities.description: Regulus is Kreacher's master, whom he calls out for help.

entities.name: mistress black
entities.description: Mistress Black is a person that Kreacher cries out to for help.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is the Dark Lord who is torturing Kreacher with a potion.

relationships.description: Kreacher cries out to Master Regulus for help.
Kreacher also cries out to Mistress Black for help.
Voldemort is torturing Kreacher with a potion.
